text:
Sorry for taking your time,
especially when the debut live is approaching.

No need to worry.
Being able to work hard for the fans like this is a blessing.

I see...
Sakuya's fans are fortunate too.

Hehe...
If that's the case, it would be incredibly gratifying.

Lately, there have been more people saying they
like idol Sakuya Shirase, that they're fans...
And... it makes my heart leap with joy.

In that case... I need to make sure everyone who says that
enjoys the debut live.
Oh, of course, that's the plan.

During my time as a model, people projected
an image of solitude onto me...

but... I've always cherished connections with others...
and I strongly feel like I want to live within those connections.

Ah... If there's anything I can do for that purpose,
please let me help, too.

Hehe, those are reassuring words.
But... you've already done more than enough, Producer.
